sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>During a chase, the character adds boost dice equal to his ranks in Shortcut to any checks made to catch or escape an opponent.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Shortcut</name> <number>TAL0001218</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 12:46:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>dd41942e2f7f1490e0f497eef699b67d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 12:46:48</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
